alert.note: Alert for Ulster (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 3:24AM EST until January 10 at 11:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO LATE THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Rondout Creek at Rosendale. * WHEN...From this morning to late this evening. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Minor flood stage. Floods US Route 209 near Accord. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:30 AM EST Wednesday the stage was 14.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early this morning to a crest of 19.0 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage this evening. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Rondout Creek Rosendale Flood Stage: 18.0 Observed Stage at Wed 2 am: 14.6 Forecast: Wed 7 am 18.4 Wed 1 pm 19.0 Wed 7 pm 17.9 Thu 1 am 16.6 Thu 7 am 15.7 Thu 1 pm 14.9 Thu 7 pm 14.1 Fri 1 am 13.2 Fri 7 am 12.6 &&
